snippet: The home builder’s report follows similar results from rivals like D. R. Horton and Toll Brothers.
abstract: Home builder Hovnanian Enterprises reports fiscal second-quarter profit of $1.8 million, or 2 cents a share, compared with a loss of $72.7 million, or 69 cents a share, in year-ago quarter; revenue rose 34 percent to $341.7 million.
lead_paragraph: The home builder’s report follows similar results from rivals like D. R. Horton and Toll Brothers.

headline.seo: Hovnanian Posts First Profit in 2 Years
headline.main: Hovnanian Posts Its First Profit in 2 Years
headline.print_headline: Hovnanian Posts Its First Profit in 2 Years
